attr.title: Dokimon
attr.desc: "Whoa, watch out!" That was close, didn't you know Dokimon are dangerous!?ãƒ¼Step into Xelos region, where you'll set off on an adventure to uncover the mystery behind your missing childhood friend.
attr.inst: Download the beta on Steam and copy all the data to `ports/dokimon/gamedata`. On first run the game will be patched. If you like the game, wishlist it!
